subject: Re: [junit] How to run the test cases using maven
msgSnippet: Just put the tests in src/test then run mvn test from the root of the project directory. Also - see: http://maven.apache.org/guides/index.html
messageBody:
Just put the tests in src/test

then run

mvn test

from the root of the project directory.

Also - see:

http://maven.apache.org/guides/index.html

p_thanuja82 wrote:
>
>
> Hi All,
>
> I am new to maven.Please anybody tell me how can I declare the
> test cases in maven-pom.xml. And how to run the test cases.
>
> Thanks & Regards,
> Thanuja.
>
>
